html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-10512023-10-20TC
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations (Vehicle Exemptions)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (VEHICLE EXEMPTIONS) in order to (1) require fewer details on the compliance or information labels; (2) prescribe that, for a vehicle with limited or no window surfaces, the information label must be securely applied to any readily accessible and visible external surface; and (3) make consequential amendments to relevant vehicle exemption provisions in accordance with updates made to the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations as part of Bill S-2.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0222 Publication Date: 2023-11-08
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations (Vehicle Exemptions)
precis: Regulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (VEHICLE EXEMPTIONS) in order to (1) require fewer details on the compliance or information labels; (2) prescribe that, for a vehicle with limited or no window surfaces, the information label must be securely applied to any readily accessible and visible external surface; and (3) make consequential amendments to relevant vehicle exemption provisions in accordance with updates made to the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations as part of Bill S-2.
